mapper.select: select int_index, ind_index, e.ent_index, int_start, int_roomnumber, e.ent_name name from interview join enterprise e on interview.ent_index = e.ent_index where ind_index=#{index} and int_start > now()

select a.*, b.ind_name from (select int_index, ind_index, e.ent_index, int_start, int_end, int_roomnumber, int_show,e.ent_name, int_done from interview join enterprise e on interview.ent_index = e.ent_index where ind_index= #{index} and now() > int_end) a join individual b on a.ind_index = b.ind_index;

select j.*, e.ent_name from (select int_index, i.ind_index, ent_index, int_start, int_roomnumber, i.ind_name from interview join individual i on interview.ind_index = i.ind_index ) j join enterprise e on j.ent_index = e.ent_index where j.ent_index=#{index} and int_start > now();

select int_index, i.ind_index, ent_index, int_start, int_end, int_roomnumber, int_show, i.ind_name name ,int_done from interview join individual i on interview.ind_index = i.ind_index where ent_index=#{index} and now() > int_end
mapper.insert: insert into interview(ind_index, ent_index, int_start, int_url) values(#{ind_index}, #{ent_index}, #{int_start}, #{int_url})
